original_text: The 13th day of the 12th month (Adar) was the day when the enemies of the Jews had hoped to attack them. But now the king's new law said that the Jews could fight to keep themselves safe on that day. So the Jews won against their enemies.
korean_text: 아달월 곧 열두째 달 십삼일은 왕의 어명을 시행하게 된 날이라 유다인의 대적들이 그들을 제거하기를 바랐더니 유다인이 도리어 자기들을 미워하는 자들을 제거하게 된 그 날에
